name: Thrown Apart
description:
VILE creatures roam the countryside and RAVAGE its villagers.  CLAW your way out of the grave and STRIKE back with the only thing you have left.  Your own bones.

Made in 3 days for Mini-Jam 92 with a theme of "Death" and a limitation of "Your health is your weapon."

HOW TO PLAY
  • WASD to move.
  • Arrow keys to throw bones.
  • Kill enemies by hitting them with your projectiles.
  • Lives are lost for getting hit and shooting.
  • On death, take over another villager and continue the battle.
